OptionConfiguration.description: The OptionConfiguration property type specifies an individual option, and its settings, within an AWS::RDS::OptionGroup resource.

properties.name: DBSecurityGroupMemberships
properties.description: A list of DBSecurityGroupMembership name strings used for this option.

type.description: A list of DBSecurityGroupMembership name strings used for this option.

properties.name: OptionName
properties.description: The configuration of options to include in a group.

type.description: The configuration of options to include in a group.

properties.name: OptionSettings
properties.description: The option settings to include in an option group.

type.description: The option settings to include in an option group.

properties.name: Port
properties.description: The optional port for the option.

type.description: The optional port for the option.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroupMemberships
properties.description: A list of VpcSecurityGroupMembership name strings used for this option.

type.description: A list of VpcSecurityGroupMembership name strings used for this option.

OptionSetting.description: The OptionSetting property type specifies the value for an option within an OptionSetting property.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the option that has settings that you can set.

type.description: The name of the option that has settings that you can set.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The current value of the option setting.

type.description: The current value of the option setting.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: The AWS::RDS::OptionGroup resource creates an option group, to enable and configure features that are specific to a particular DB engine.

properties.name: OptionGroupName
properties.description: Specifies the name of the option group.

type.description: Specifies the name of the option group.

properties.name: OptionGroupDescription
properties.description: Provides a description of the option group.

type.description: Provides a description of the option group.

properties.name: EngineName
properties.description: Indicates the name of the engine that this option group can be applied to.

type.description: Indicates the name of the engine that this option group can be applied to.

properties.name: MajorEngineVersion
properties.description: Indicates the major engine version associated with this option group.

type.description: Indicates the major engine version associated with this option group.

properties.name: OptionConfigurations
properties.description: Indicates what options are available in the option group.

type.description: Indicates what options are available in the option group.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
